skills.name: BOOK OF THE DEAD
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to a single target.
• Grant Perfect Health to self and a random ally for 1 turn.
• 35% Chance to Revive a dead ally with full HP.
• 35% Chance to grant an Extra Turn to a random ally.

skills.name: SONG OF OSIRIS
desc: • Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects from all allies.
• Revive all dead allies with 60% HP.
• Heal allies based on their ATK and MAGIC stat.

skills.name: ENDURING DYNASTY
desc: Grant Perfect Immortality to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle. Grant Endure and Immunity to allies below 50% HP for 2 turns at the start of each turn.
